item.title: Logistic Regression
item.description: Function Set We want to find $P_{w,b}(C_1|x)$ $P_{w, b}(C_1|x) = \sigma(z)$ $ z = w \cdot x + b = \sum\limits_iw_ix_i + b $ function set: $f_{w, b}(x) = P_{w, b}(C_1|x)$ // including all different w and b Goodness of a Function 取minima的 对象写成一个function，这个fun

item.title: Regression
item.description: Regression: Input a vector, the function outputs a scalar. 使用简单模型 预测问题：根据前面的浏览数据，预测后面的浏览量 Function with Unknown Parameters Model: $y = b + wx_1$ $y$(Label): no. of views on 2/26， $x_1$(feature): no. of views on 2/25 $w$(weight) and $b$(bias) are unknown parameters
